import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { HashRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Search, Mail, RefreshCw, Database, Wrench, ChevronRight, X, Menu, User, Calendar, AlertCircle, Settings, HelpCircle } from 'lucide-react'; // Import components import S3Contents from './components/S3Contents'; import Predictions from './components/Predictions'; import AthenaQuery from './components/AthenaQuery'; import SendEmail from './components/SendEmail'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [streaming, setStreaming] = useState(false); const [streamMessage, setStreamMessage] = useState(''); const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [activeSlide, setActiveSlide] = useState(0); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); // Featured devices data const featuredDevices = [ { id: 1, name: "VITASCAN PRO", category: "Diagnostic", description: "Advanced imaging solution with AI-powered diagnostics", maintenance: "Quarterly calibration required", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1579684385127-1ef15d508118?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80" }, { id: 2, name: "PULSEWAVE X3", category: "Monitoring", description: "Next-gen patient monitoring system with wireless connectivity", maintenance: "Monthly software updates recommended", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581595219315-a187dd40c322?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80" }, { id: 3, name: "SURGEPRECISION", category: "Surgical", description: "High-precision surgical device with real-time feedback", maintenance: "Sterilization after each use, annual overhaul", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581093450022-4b1d3c4b1e1a?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80" } ]; // Equipment categories const categories = [ { name: "Diagnostic Equipment", count: 24, icon: }, { name: "Monitoring Devices", count: 18, icon: }, { name: "Surgical Tools", count: 36, icon: }, { name: "Laboratory Equipment", count: 42, icon: }, { name: "Rehabilitation Devices", count: 15, icon: } ]; const toggleStream = async () => { try { const res = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/toggle-stream', { method: 'POST', }); const data = await res.json(); setStreaming(data.streaming); setStreamMessage(data.message || ''); } catch (error) { console.error('Error toggling stream:', error); setStreamMessage('❌ Failed to toggle stream.'); } }; // Simulate loading state useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setIsLoading(false); }, 1500); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); // Auto-slide the featured devices useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setActiveSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % featuredDevices.length); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [featuredDevices.length]); if (isLoading) { return (

); } // Reusable Components const NavLink = ({ to, icon, label }) => ( {icon} {label} ); const MobileNavLink = ({ to, icon, label, onClick }) => (

    • ); // Add additional CSS for animations const style = document.createElement('style'); style.innerHTML = ` @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } @keyframes slideInRight { from { transform: translateX(30px); opacity: 0; } to { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } } @keyframes slideDown { from { max-height: 0; opacity: 0; } to { max-height: 500px; opacity: 1; } } .animate-fadeIn { animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out forwards; } .animate-slideInRight { animation: slideInRight 0.6s ease-out forwards; } .animate-slideDown { animation: slideDown 0.3s ease-out; overflow: hidden; } `; document.head.appendChild(style); export default App;
